keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Nikola Gruevski submitted his resignation, clearing the way for elections within 100 days, but the opposition said that was not enough time to organize a fair vote.

headline.main: Macedonian Prime Minister Steps Down, but Tensions Over Vote Linger

snippet: Nikola Gruevski submitted his resignation, clearing the way for elections within 100 days, but the opposition said that was not enough time to organize a fair vote.
